metadata.title: CVE-2018-19801 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
aubio v0.4.0 to v0.4.8 has a NULL pointer dereference innew_aubio_filterbank via invalid n_filters.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19801` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

aubio-tools - 0.4.9-2
libaubio5 - 0.4.9-2
python3-aubio - 0.4.9-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: aubio package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.4.9-2').
